arts.ttl: Walsall take charge of play-off with victory at Chesterfield
arts.sum: Walsall took charge of their League Two play-off semi-final with a 2-0 first-leg victory at Chesterfield.

arts.ttl: Walsall in control of play-off tie after winning away at Chesterfield
arts.sum: Goals from Taylor Allen and Alfie Chang secured a 2-0 victory.

arts.ttl: Chesterfield vs Walsall Prediction: Team News, Predicted Lineups and Where To Watch
